text: Vars is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department. == Ski resort == It is famous for its ski resort that has 185 kilometres of ski slopes. == Population == == Transport == === Road === The D431 and D902 roads pass through Vars. == References == Category:Communes in Hautes-Alpes Category:Ski areas and resorts in France
title: Vars, Hautes-Alpes
